entities.description: An identifier code assigned to each specific drug.
The name of the drug, which may include brand name or generic name.
Number of times a specific drug was mentioned in the category of Stimulant OTHER.
Percentage of the a specific drug use among all stimulant drugs specified in the category.

relationships.description: Associates a drug with its assigned code.
Associates a drug with its name.
Indicates the number of times a specific drug was mentioned in the category of Stimulant OTHER.
Defines the percentage of the a specific drug use among all stimulant drugs specified in the category.
